name: Resource-Constrained Project Scheduling - CR3
content: Some resources are unavailable during specified maintenance windows. Any activity that requires such a resource is not allowed to overlap the corresponding unavailable window. All original precedence and resource-capacity constraints remain in force, and the objective remains to minimize project completion time.
value_info: `horizon`: Integer upper bound on the scheduling time range.
`capacities`: List[int], where capacities[r] is the capacity of resource r.
`jobs`: List where each job is `[duration, successors, demands]`.
`unavailable_windows`: List of triplets `[resource, start, end]`, meaning the resource is unavailable on interval `[start, end)`.

var1.descr: `start_times`: List[int] of length n_jobs, where start_times[i] is the start time of activity i.
